snippet: The central bank, which entered the year planning to raise rates four times, has scaled back those plans as economic growth has disappointed expectations.
abstract: Federal Reserve announces it will not raise benchmark interest rate; Fed notes economic output has increased even as job growth has slowed, reaffirming its cautious approach to any increases in interest rates.
lead_paragraph: The central bank, which entered the year planning to raise rates four times, has scaled back those plans as economic growth has disappointed expectations.

headline.main: Fed Holds Interest Rates Steady and Plans Slower Increases
headline.print_headline: Growth Tepid, Fed Slows Plan to Raise Rates
